content.rendered: A veteran of Berklee College of Music, trombone player Ozzie Melendez is also a writer, arranger, producer, vocalist, and composer in multiple genres (pop, Latin, jazz).

yoast_head:
<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v25.2 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>Ozzie Melendez | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="A veteran of Berklee College of Music, trombone player Ozzie Melendez is also a writer, arranger, producer, vocalist, and composer in multiple genres (pop, Latin, jazz). He has toured with Latin superstar Marc Anthony, Celia Cruz, Willie Colon, Diana Ross, and Blood Sweat and Tears. His album credits include performances on releases from Mariah Carey, Jennifer Lopez, Billy Joel, Paul Simon, Marc Anthony, Juan Gabriel, Vanessa Williams, and David Bryne. He also performed at the inaugural celebrations for Presidents Bill Clinton and Barack Obama. Melendez’s solo album Nota de Amor was released in 2019." />

His album credits include performances on releases from Mariah Carey, Jennifer Lopez, Billy Joel, Paul Simon, Marc Anthony, Juan Gabriel, Vanessa Williams, and David Bryne. yoast_head_json.title: Ozzie Melendez | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: A veteran of Berklee College of Music, trombone player Ozzie Melendez is also a writer, arranger, producer, vocalist, and composer in multiple genres (pop, Latin, jazz). He has toured with Latin superstar Marc Anthony, Celia Cruz, Willie Colon, Diana Ross, and Blood Sweat and Tears. His album credits include performances on releases from Mariah Carey, Jennifer Lopez, Billy Joel, Paul Simon, Marc Anthony, Juan Gabriel, Vanessa Williams, and David Bryne. He also performed at the inaugural celebrations for Presidents Bill Clinton and Barack Obama. Melendez’s solo album Nota de Amor was released in 2019.

His album credits include performances on releases from Mariah Carey, Jennifer Lopez, Billy Joel, Paul Simon, Marc Anthony, Juan Gabriel, Vanessa Williams, and David Bryne. He also performed at the inaugural celebrations for Presidents Bill Clinton and Barack Obama. Melendez’s solo album Nota de Amor was released in 2019.
